message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you my product for $1150000. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and it allows me to secure a good return on my investment. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer.  While I understand you're looking for a great deal, $1000000 simply doesn't cover my costs. I'm willing to be flexible, but I need to be compensated fairly for this valuable product.  I'm prepared to offer it to you for $1050000.  This price represents a substantial discount from my initial offer and is still a fair price for both of us. Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still trying to make this a good deal for myself. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1020000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
